channel.title: Help with specials pl0x?
channel.description:
i've been wonderin how to edit specs?? can any1 teach me/explain me how?
1. i wanna make a gmaul hit 3 times :) 2. i wanna make a admin only weapon with awesome spec 4-5 hit :P 3. i wanna add obby maul spec xD
can any1 help me with dis??
Edit: Im using hustlascape source, or project tony or fuzion scape :s im a bit confused.. but oh well xD
